jobDescription: Assist in planning, coordinating, and executing IT projects. Work closely with technical teams, business stakeholders, and senior project managers to ensure timely delivery, resource coordination, and quality outcomes.
requiredSkills: Project tracking tools (Jira, Asana, MS Excel)
preferredQualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, IT, Engineering, or related field
Certification in project management (e.g., PMP, CAPM, CSM)
Exposure to DevOps practices and cloud environments
Experience working with cross-functional teams or tech clients
